Text: Hey BeOSDano, I've been looking for a long time for the 1970 movie, "The Love War." I notice you posted it about a year ago. If you still have it, any chance you could re-seed it?     Ro-Z

I still have the  movie "The Love War", and another old LLoyd Bridges movie "The Deadly Dream". Both are very rare made for TV movies from 1970 and 1971 respectively. I'll reseed starting Sunday June 17.

Hi BeOSDano0! I just got your message today. I'll leave my connection up to try to get this from you. And I promise I'll re-seed once the download is complete, to spread the wealth around a little bit. Thanks!   - Alaska Jack
Oh PS, I don't know if you ever upload to USENET, but I've also been monitoring alt.binaries.multimedia.scifi hoping to see this, and I know a few others have as well. Just a thought.   - AJ
